net.sf.mmm.util.nls.base

Class AbstractNlsBundleFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractComponent
      • net.sf.mmm.util.nls.base.AbstractNlsBundleFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NlsBundleFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NlsBundleFactoryImpl

    public abstract class AbstractNlsBundleFactory
extends AbstractComponent
implements NlsBundleFactory
    This is the abstract base implementation of NlsBundleFactory.
    Since:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

      This inner class holds all the information to be cached for a NlsBundle-method.

    • Method Detail

      • createBundle

        public <BUNDLE extends NlsBundle> BUNDLE createBundle(Class<BUNDLE> bundleInterface)
        This method dynamically creates an instance for the given bundleInterface.
        Specified by:
        createBundle in interface NlsBundleFactory
        Type Parameters:
        BUNDLE - is the generic type of the requested NlsBundle.
        Parameters:
        bundleInterface - the interface of the requested NlsBundle. Has to be a sub-interface of NlsBundle with according methods.
        Returns:
        an instance of the requested NlsBundle interface.

      • getBundleOptions

        protected NlsBundleOptions getBundleOptions(Class<? extends NlsBundle> bundleInterface)
        This method gets the NlsBundleOptions for the given bundleInterface. If NOT present a default instance is returned.
        Parameters:
        bundleInterface - is the Class reflecting the NlsBundle interface.
        Returns:
        the annotated NlsBundleOptions or the default if bundleInterface is NOT annotated accordingly.

      • createHandler

        protected InvocationHandler createHandler(Class<? extends NlsBundle> bundleInterface)
        This method creates a new InvocationHandler for the given bundleInterface.
        Parameters:
        bundleInterface - is the Class reflecting the NlsBundle interface.
        Returns:
        the InvocationHandler for the given bundleInterface.
